criteria.description: Reward function properly executes the expression and checks to see if the expression equals 24.
criteria.justification: Expression is parsed from <solution> XML and evaluated safely (codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/env.py:34, codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/rollout.py:64). Reward assigns 1.0 when abs(result - 24) == 0 (codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/rollout.py:69-72).

criteria.description: Reward function makes sure that the expression uses all four digits exactly once.
criteria.justification: No validation that all four provided digits are used exactly once; only instruction in the system prompt without enforcement (codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/rollout.py:28-36).

criteria.description: Environment and prompting is setup to elicit thinking / reasoning in a <thinking> tag or some equivalent manner.
criteria.justification: Prompts request only a <solution> XML; no thinking or reasoning tags are elicited in messages (codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/rollout.py:28-36).

criteria.description: Reward function is smooth, where even if the expression is not exactly 24, there is a positive reward for being close to 24.
criteria.justification: Linear shaping: reward = max(0, 1 - abs(result - 24)/24) provides graded positive rewards when close to 24 (codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/rollout.py:69-72).

criteria.description: There is either a penatly for not following the formatting the prompt demands, or a reward for following the formatting the prompt demands.
criteria.justification: Invalid or non-XML/unevaluable responses raise errors and are penalized with reward = -1.0 and an invalid_solution metric (codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/rollout.py:73-78; codex_runs/24/o4-mini/20250920_234523/env.py:17-31).

notes: Core evaluation and smooth reward shaping are implemented. Missing are (a) enforcement that all four digits are used exactly once, and (b) prompting or mechanisms to elicit explicit reasoning in a <thinking> (or similar) tag.
